thread.title: Score Big at the ‘Tailsgate’: Clutch’s Fundraiser for PSPCA Packed with Fun, Food, and Eagles Fever!
thread.title_full: Score Big at the ‘Tailsgate’: Clutch’s Fundraiser for PSPCA Packed with Fun, Food, and Eagles Fever!

author: MyChesCo
title: Score Big at the ‘Tailsgate’: Clutch’s Fundraiser for PSPCA Packed with Fun, Food, and Eagles Fever!
text:
PHILADELPHIA, PA — Get ready, Philadelphia pet lovers! Clutch is hosting its second annual ‘Tailsgate’ event on Sunday, November 5th from 12:00 PM – 4:00 PM, and you’re invited. This exciting tailgate party will be held at Lot G1, Wells Fargo Center Parking Lot, promising an afternoon of fun, food, and football fever!
The Pennsylvania Society for Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (PSPCA) is teaming up with Clutch, a creative staffing firm, and over 25 sponsors like Tito’s Vodka and Saks Fifth Avenue for this event. All proceeds from the tickets, silent auction, and raffle will go directly to the PSPCA.
For just $40, your ‘Tailsgate’ ticket gives you access to unlimited food and beverages, live entertainment, games, and a chance to win two tickets to the day’s big Eagles vs. Cowboys game. Plus, don’t miss your opportunity to bid on Phillies gear signed by Kyle Schwarber and Alec Bohm in the silent auction.
Cheer on the Eagles, indulge in delicious food and drinks, and most importantly, support the PSPCA’s mission. Let’s unite for a good cause and make a difference for our four-legged friends!
‘Tailsgate’ tickets can be purchased
here.
For the latest news on everything happening in
Chester County and the surrounding area, be sure to follow MyChesCo on Google News.

organizations.name: pennsylvania society for prevention of cruelty
